question: India is the co-host along with which country at the 8th Asian Ministerial Energy Roundtable (AMER8)?
explanation: India is the co-host along with UAE at the 8th Asian Ministerial Energy Roundtable (AMER8) in Abu Dhabi. Petroleum and Natural Gas Minister Dharmendra Pradhan is participating in the 3-day conference which  will debate energy security in the age of change with a view to empower responsible growth in Asia and the world.
